p: The docking analysis on compounds of 2-(4-fluorophenyl) imidazole-5-ones derivatives with the protein target, Polo-like kinase 1(PKL1) in complex with B16727 was performed. 5 compounds with high pIC 50 were chosen for these studies, amongst the 5, compound 24 and 27 had the highest docking score of −8.8 and − 9.1 kcal/mol as seen in Table 8.
